DOC.brief_title: A Safety Study LY2886721 Single Doses Healthy Subjects
DOC.detailed_description: This Phase 1 study 2 part , healthy subject . Part 1 subject- investigator-blind , placebo-controlled , randomize , 3-period , crossover study . Part 1 assess safety tolerability LY2886721 single dos , body handle drug , drug 's effect body . Part 2 subject- investigator-blind , placebo-controlled , randomize study ass safety tolerability LY2886721 single dose , body handle drug , drug 's effect body include cerebrospinal fluid .
DOC.criteria: Healthy men nonchildbearing potential woman 20 year old Body mass index 1832 kg/m2 Taking overthecounter prescription medication exception vitamins mineral stable dos thyroid estrogen hormone replacement Smoke 10 cigarette per day
